hero.title: ADVANCED FACIAL SEARCH TECHNOLOGY
hero.subtitle: Uncover identities securely with Face Seek's AI-powered facial recognition platform. Trusted by investigators, journalists, and security professionals worldwide for ethical OSINT research.

card1.title: LIGHTNING-FAST FACIAL SEARCH
card1.desc: Our reverse image face search technology scans millions of indexed images in milliseconds. Advanced AI face lookup algorithms deliver instant results across global data clusters.

card2.title: PRIVACY-FOCUSED FACIAL SEARCH
card2.desc: Industry-leading 256-bit encryption protects every facial recognition search. Your image data is never permanently stored, ensuring complete privacy in facial intelligence operations.

card3.title: MULTI-ENGINE OSINT FACE SEARCH
card3.desc: Simultaneous queries across Google, Bing, Yandex, and specialized OSINT databases. Our facial search engine aggregates results from the world's largest public web indexes.

card4.title: PRECISION BIOMETRIC MATCHING
card4.desc: State-of-the-art facial recognition algorithms achieve 98.7% accuracy. Our image intelligence platform uses 128-point facial mapping for unmatched precision in face recognition search.

card5.title: ETHICAL AI FACIAL RECOGNITION
card5.desc: Full GDPR and KVKK compliance for responsible facial intelligence. Our platform adheres to international standards for ethical AI and open-source intelligence protocols.

card6.title: COMPREHENSIVE FACIAL ANALYTICS
card6.desc: Detailed metadata reports for every facial search result. Track confidence scores, source URLs, and image context with our advanced facial recognition SaaS platform.

step1.title: IMAGE UPLOAD
step1.desc: Upload your target image to our secure facial search engine. Our platform accepts all standard formats and automatically optimizes resolution for maximum face recognition accuracy.

step2.title: AI FACIAL MAPPING
step2.desc: Advanced biometric algorithms extract 128 unique facial landmarks. Our image intelligence system creates a mathematical signature for precise facial recognition search across billions of indexed images.

step3.title: MULTI-SOURCE INDEXING
step3.desc: Your facial search query is simultaneously processed across Google, Bing, Yandex, and specialized OSINT databases. Our reverse image face search technology aggregates results from global web indexes in real-time.

step4.title: RESULTS & ANALYTICS
step4.desc: Receive comprehensive facial intelligence reports with confidence scores, source URLs, and contextual metadata. Every face recognition search includes detailed analytics for professional verification.

feature1.title: Reverse Image Face Search
feature1.description: Upload any photo and find matching faces across Google, Bing, Yandex, and specialized OSINT databases. Our AI facial recognition engine processes billions of images.

feature2.title: OSINT Face Search
feature2.description: Professional-grade open-source intelligence tools for investigative journalism, cybersecurity research, and lawful identification purposes.

feature3.title: Privacy-Focused Facial Search
feature3.description: GDPR and KVKK compliant. No permanent biometric databases. Images deleted within 24 hours. Your facial search queries remain private.

feature4.title: Ethical AI Facial Recognition
feature4.description: Responsible facial intelligence platform with strict acceptable use policies. Public data only. No law enforcement affiliations.

feature5.title: Multi-Engine Aggregation
feature5.description: Search across multiple sources simultaneously for comprehensive facial intelligence results.

feature6.title: Facial Recognition SaaS
feature6.description: Cloud-based facial search engine accessible from anywhere. No installation required. Enterprise API available.

howItWorks.title: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.subtitle: Professional facial search in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.description: Upload a photo containing a face. Our facial search engine automatically detects and extracts facial features using advanced AI facial mapping technology.

step2.title: AI Processing
step2.description: Our facial recognition algorithms create a unique biometric signature and search across billions of indexed images from Google, Bing, Yandex, and OSINT databases through multi-source indexing.

step3.title: Get Results
step3.description: Receive comprehensive facial intelligence reports with match confidence scores, source URLs, and contextual information for professional verification.

cta.title: START YOUR FACIAL SEARCH
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals using FaceSeek for ethical facial intelligence. Get 3 free searches to experience our AI face lookup platform.

footer.description: FaceSeek is the world's leading ethical facial recognition search platform for OSINT research, investigative journalism, and security professionals.

about.title: ETHICAL FACIAL INTELLIGENCE & RESPONSIBLE AI
about.intro: FaceSeek is the world's leading privacy-focused facial search engine, built on principles of ethical AI, transparency, and responsible facial recognition technology.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.description: To provide professionals with powerful facial intelligence tools while maintaining the highest standards of privacy, ethics, and legal compliance. We believe facial recognition technology should empower legitimate investigation without compromising individual rights.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.description: A future where facial search technology serves society through responsible AI-powered image intelligence, strict privacy safeguards, and unwavering commitment to ethical facial recognition practices.

blog.title: FACESEEK BLOG
blog.subtitle: Expert insights on facial recognition search, OSINT facial intelligence, and ethical AI.
